text: NBC was an British pay television owned by NBCUniversal International Networks. The channel was available on Sky. The channel launched on 5 June 2005 as Telemundo but was rebranded as NBC on 4 June 2014. The channel aired shows from the US NBC. The channel closed on 24 November 2022. Category:Telemundo Category:NBC Category:Television channels in Europe
title: NBC (British and Irish TV channel)
